question: How to react work?
answer: Reactjs is a javascript library.react function behind the screen as a virtual DOM. When we create a jsx component, jsx converts it to maintain pure javascript code and work as a tree. When changing the react state, create a virtual dome and capture this change and place it in the real dome. Reactjs is a way to convert jsx / javascript code to HTML code. This is why React manipulated web sites are very first and give a smooth UI .
